title: Sharkmo Teemo Skin PLEASE?!
body:
Is it possible for a **Shark Teemo Skin** (Sharkmo) / **Definitely Not Teemo**  skin or possibly even **URF Teemo** skin to be made / become available ? 

Animation for spells ideas:

 - Normal attacks can shoot a harpoon without the barbed tip on the end ?

"Q" Shoots a harpoon

"W" Leaves a trail of blood / water behind him as he runs away

"E" Instead of purple poison, the visual effects could just be changed to red particles 

"R" Places a bucket full of tasty bait fish

I think its a cool concept and would be a great addition to the Teemo skins :)

Skin mesh made by [matchek2](http://matchek2.deviantart.com/art/Teemo-Sharkmo-485510917)

replies.body: Looks like a neat skin! Would totally buy it!
Make the skin just for this guy please, he is a god at teemo who carried me in mid Diamond yesterday :D{{champion:17}}
no make devil skin for teemo be much better
